keyPolicies.policyDescription: I believe that our EU should not become a super-state. We found Europe, joining the scrap to veto the Lisbon Treaty, and I stand against any further transfer of power.
Our Armed Forces are the backbone of this nation's security. Service men and women should be well supported, and their families properly looked after.

mentions.candidate: Yes, we do have a binge drinking problem in our towns

issues.brexitEurope: I stand against any further transfer of power.
issues.economy: A Conservative government would pay every household a Domestic Power Grant.
issues.education: We need change, to let heads, not bureaucracies, run schools.
issues.environment: A Conservative government would pay every household a Domestic Power Grant to facilitate the Green Deal to make energy efficiency improvements.
issues.health: The NHS does a fantastic job in West Dorset. To enable it to do even more for its patients during a period of financial austerity, we need to cut the bureaucratic overhead.

housing.content: A Conservative government would pay every household a Domestic Power Grant to facilitate the Green Deal to make energy efficiency improvements.

leaflet.personalStatement: Why do you want to get involved in politics? As a lawyer primarily focussed on the big political questions – like how do we create sustainable economic growth or think of anything more interesting or fulfilling than to spend my life involved in finding the answers.

politicalExperience.role: Member of Parliament for West Dorset

contactInformation.address: Chapel House, Dorchester Road, Maiden Newton, Dorchester DT2 0BG

images.caption: OLIVER LETWIN during his daily shift to cover the extra shift of volunteers at his local community centre.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet is a Q&A format introducing Oliver Letwin's views on NHS, education, the environment, drinking-related violence, and EU powers. It also mentions support for Armed Forces families and a personal statement about his motivation for involvement in politics. Contact information is provided, as well as an image caption.
